system.description:
The magical effect instantly reduces the user to 6 inches in height. The user can only attack creatures smaller than 1 foot for normal damage. They can slip through small cracks and have a 90% chance of not being seen when standing still. This transformation will cancel any previous growth effects without ill consequences.

It lasts for 7-12 turns (1d6+6), with the exact duration known only to the DM.
system.effect: Reduces the user to 6 inches in height
